titles.title: Taxpayer Information Protection and Privacy Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restrict the use of tax return information by preparers of returns.
Taxpayer Information Protection and Privacy Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Civil Rights and Liberties, Minority Issues

bill.summary: Taxpayer Information Protection and Privacy Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to prohibit tax return preparers from: (1) soliciting taxpayers for consent to the disclosure or use of their tax return information for any purpose; and (2) disclosing tax return information to tax preparers located outside the United States without taxpayer consent.
